handleSuspect

public void handleSuspect(ReliableConnection connection,
                          java.lang.Exception e,
                          Queue unsent)
Message from transport when a particular connection is suspect.
Implements:
handleSuspect in interface ReliableConnectionEventHandler
Parameters:
connection - the connection under suspicion
e - the Exception leading to the suspicion (may be null)
unsent - a Queue of unsent SessionViewPackets

handleDisconnect

public void handleDisconnect(ReliableConnection connection,
                             java.lang.Exception e,
                             Queue unsent)
Message from transport when a connection has been severed.
Implements:
handleDisconnect in interface ReliableConnectionEventHandler
Parameters:
connection - the connection that has been severed
e - the Exception leading to the disconnect
unsent - a Queue of unsent SessionViewPackets

handleNetInput

public void handleNetInput(ReliableConnection connection,
                           SessionViewPacket packet) throws java.io.IOException
Message from transport when data has been received.
Implements:
handleNetInput in interface ReliableConnectionEventHandler
Parameters:
connection - the connection responsible for the data
packet - the SessionViewPacket that has been received
Throws:
java.io.IOException - thrown if some problem reading from the packet
